## MeshMaterial.clone() method

Create a shallow clone of this material. Subclasses should override to copy custom fields.

**Signature:**

```typescript
clone(): MeshMaterial;
```
**Returns:**

[MeshMaterial](doc/markdown/./scene.meshmaterial.md)
